about_the_game:
Your character is not a hero, he is not a machine, he is a normal person just like you.
It is your duty to get to the bottom of all this. Dialogue. Explore. Struggle. Discover.
Exile is a video game whose gameplay is based on exploration, narrative and decision making.
A game to explore and discover a story through the scenario.



Discover all the secrets of the island thanks to the revelations that you will live in your dreams,
in which you will have to flee from death itself and make decisions that will have consequences
when you wake up, and can even cause the death of the people who cohabit with you.



You will be able to discover their different endings until you find the best solution, explore during the day, you will have to explore during the day and be
attentive to all kinds of details, those details will be very important for the decisions that you will have to make during dreams, and they will be able to
influence from the stage, or the death of the characters who live with you on the island, and all this for 3 days in which you can lead to a good ending or a bad ending.





Features:

- Singleplayer
- Action
- Adventure
- Exploration
- Game Thinking
- Interactive Story
- Replayability
- Open world
- Unique soundtrack
- Narrative based
